ground_truth.thought: 查询所请求的所有任务已完成。
ground_truth.name: FinishAction

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'GovernmentPortal.get_latest_announcement', 'description': 'Get the latest government announcement on a specific topic.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the topic of the announcement'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'announcement', 'description': 'the text of the latest government announcement'}]}, {'name': 'EducationDepartment.analyze_policy_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of a specific educational policy on local education investment.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policy_id', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the ID of the policy'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'the analysis of the policy impact'}]}, {'name': 'TaxAuthority.get_local_education_surcharge_rate', 'description': 'Get the local education surcharge rate for a specific region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the region name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'surcharge_rate', 'description': 'the local education surcharge rate'}]}, {'name': 'ElectronicTaxBureau.guide_surcharge_declaration', 'description': 'Guide on how to declare the local education surcharge through the electronic tax bureau.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the region name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'declaration_guide', 'description': 'the guide on how to declare the surcharge'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我需要了解中国地方教育附加的最新动态。首先，获取最新的关于地方教育附加改革的政府公告。然后，分析这些政策对地方教育投入的影响。接着，查询我所在地区的地方教育附加率。最后，了解如何通过电子税务局进行地方教育附加的申报。
获取最新的关于地方教育附加改革的政府公告
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
GovernmentPortal.get_latest_announcement
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
education_surcharge_reform
{'announcement': 'The government has announced new reforms to the local education surcharge, aiming to increase funding for local educational projects.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'announcement': 'The government has announced new reforms to the local education surcharge, aiming to increase funding for local educational projects.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析这些政策对地方教育投入的影响
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
EducationDepartment.analyze_policy_impact
当前工具的参数'policy_id'的值是什么?
new_education_surcharge_reform
{'impact_analysis': 'The new reforms are expected to increase local education investment by 15% over the next fiscal year.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'impact_analysis': 'The new reforms are expected to increase local education investment by 15% over the next fiscal year.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
查询我所在地区的地方教育附加率
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
TaxAuthority.get_local_education_surcharge_rate
当前工具的参数'region'的值是什么?
Beijing
{'surcharge_rate': '3.5%'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'surcharge_rate': '3.5%'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
了解如何通过电子税务局进行地方教育附加的申报
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
ElectronicTaxBureau.guide_surcharge_declaration
当前工具的参数'region'的值是什么?
Beijing

{'declaration_guide': 'To declare the local education surcharge through the electronic tax bureau, log in to your account, select the appropriate tax category, enter the surcharge rate and the taxable amount, and submit the declaration.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'declaration_guide': 'To declare the local education surcharge through the electronic tax bureau, log in to your account, select the appropriate tax category, enter the surcharge rate and the taxable amount, and submit the declaration.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
